pli-tv-pvr1.14:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.14:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ …
pli-tv-pvr1.14:6.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.14:6.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ.
